main event: A green flare was observed ascending and then descending east of the Hawaiian Islands on May 1, 1960.
interesting points: The flare was reported by military personnel and observed from an aircraft., The flare ascended through overcast clouds up to 5000 feet., It was witnessed by two persons with a duration of 8 seconds., There was uncertainty regarding the origin of the flare, with various possibilities suggested., The event was evaluated as no threat.
location: East of Hawaiian Islands, Hawaii, USA
